title: Otogibanashi no Onigokko

synonyms: A Fairy Tale Game of Tag
alternative_titles.ja: おとぎばなしの鬼ごっこ

synopsis: One day, a boy finds a magic book of children's fairy tales, the plot of which can be brought to life and changed. He materializes the story of Little Red Riding Hood. And so the girl from the fairy tale, unsuspecting, brings pies to her beloved grandmother. And everything would be fine, but the boy enters the wolf and tries Little Red Riding Hood's pie himself. Then comes the turn of the fairy tale about Alice's adventures in Wonderland. And she has never seen such a wonderland that awaits her.
